A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Can we please remake this movie? All of the pieces are there for potential greatness. Instead\, this movie is full of emptiness and turns out to be a huge let down. Could have explained how Rey is so awesome at learning Mind Trick\, and could have made Finn a Force-user. Cringy humour\, poor plot (one big chase scene)\, poor character development (Finn went from First Order deserter\, to hero-in-the-making\, last film. This film. back to deserter\, to useless\, to suicidal\, to useless)\, and betrayed the character of Luke Skywalker.
